title: A Simple Method to Compute Sums of Powers and Polynomials

title: A Simple Method to Compute Sums of Powers and Polynomials
authors: Kai Cheung

abstract: This paper introduces a simpler method to compute sums of powers and polynomials, which can be done by hand, and efficiently implemented in software.
